meta.job_title: Sr Counsel I, GTAL - HIV Prevention

duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide legal and compliance advice with a focus on commercialization, promotion, marketing and advertising of the Company’s approved product(s).
Support a wide range of Company activities such as advising on promotional review, business plans, regulatory actions, investigations, and drafting compliance policies.
Monitor legal developments affecting pharmaceutical promotion and interactions with health care professionals.
Develop an understanding of business objectives and translate them into the Legal Department’s priorities to deliver practical advice to the business.
Partner with legal teams and enhance alignment and consistency of legal guidance, policy, and process.
Triage a heavy workflow, set priorities, devise solutions, and collaborate with internal and external stakeholders.
Recognize and escalate matters of specialty, or unusual complexity or risk as appropriate.
Provide prompt review and guidance to the Promotional Review Committee and Medical Review Committee.

education_certification.credential: Juris Doctorate from a nationally accredited law school. Member in good standing of the State Bar of California.
